title: tech30338
author: tech30338
content: Some people don't want to be teach by someone responding with hate when they were corrected by people who knows more about something, in return they learn nothing and stuck with little knowledge that they thought they know it all, Tips on how you will learn along they way, and be on track with crypto currency and also in real life scenario.Be open to comments by others accept and learn from itDon't get mad or upset when they correct you when you make mistakesAlways be hungry to learnApply and test what they have told youSurround yourself with people who are not greedy with informationDistance yourself with negative people, they will pull you down with themShare what you learn from others let it be a cycle of learning, to help others also, remember people never hesitate to help you to learn, you should also do the same.if you have something in mind please don't hesitate to add

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Constructive criticism is one way to learn few stuffs from others. Well its really hurt being corrected though you knew to yourself its correct but figuring out your wrong have a slight feeling of ache but if anyone learn to overcome that and accept it. Could help you grow as a user. We are in forum anyway a place where debate could happen whether what is the correct concept or solution to such dispute.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: There are barriers in life that exist invisibly such as greed, aggression, ignorance, doubt, arrogance, etc. But this is always in each of us and we will not lose it. When we realize these things in our lives, we need to know how to overcome them so as not to limit ourselves by limited binding prejudices.My view for the transmission of electrical communication is that the object is suitable for the method of transmission, not everyone wants to listen because of the above that I mentioned, it is like a circle with no way out, most of the time. We're all going to go through things that benefit the individual, then the collective. In any environment, learning will have no limit, there are also bad and beautiful things that appear for us to get trapped in the game of life, not clinging to those things that we have to see for ourselves everything is positive and contagious.

comments.author: uche6215
comments.body: If anyone responding back to a teach with hate speech then the student does not like the teacher or instructor. And this is normal thing in physical educational centers. Not all the students like all the teachers so if those teachers students hated came to the class they would not like them. Sometimes the students would even walk away.And if the student is in that class, he will not learn anything. Open minded is always there if the student like the advisers, he will accept all corrections. Nobody on earth lives without mistake, so correction make life better. It is not always one is good mood to learn. So some time you have to do other things to forget some stress in the brain.Pride is one of the thing stop people to learn from others. This one can't teach me or I can't learn from this person, that is proud and you will never know that thing again. So if you want to learn you have to swallow pride and learn from the known source.

comments.author: YUriy1991
comments.body: Quote from: tech30338 on June 20, 2023, 01:47:32 AMSome people don't want to be teach by someone responding with hate when they were corrected by people who knows more about something, in return they learn nothing and stuck with little knowledge that they thought they know it all, Tips on how you will learn along they way, and be on track with crypto currency and also in real life scenario.Be open to comments by others accept and learn from itWhile being open to comments is valuable, it is important to distinguish between constructive feedback and unhelpful criticism here. Not all comments are equal in terms of their accuracy or usefulness. Sharpness is required to filter and focus on the feedback that can actually contribute to learning.Quote from: tech30338 on June 20, 2023, 01:47:32 AMAlways be hungry to learnMaybe I see this point more, so don't rely too much on other people's opinions and don't take it completely 100% means when Receiving information blindly without critical evaluation can lead to a shallow understanding or the adoption of wrong information.Quote from: tech30338 on June 20, 2023, 01:47:32 AMif you have something in mind please don't hesitate to add Here are some additional suggestions from me:A. Practicing critical thinking, That means Assess and evaluate the information received, even when it comes from a trusted source. Think independently and develop your own understanding based on evidence and logical reasoning;B. Seek diverse perspectives. The picture is when we interact with individuals who have different viewpoints and backgrounds. Exposure to these diverse ideas can broaden our understanding, encourage critical thinking, and challenge our own assumptions;C. Embrace respectful discussion. I think by creating an environment where ideas can be shared and debated respectfully. Constructive dialogue promotes learning and helps flesh out arguments and perspectives;D. Continuously reflect and reassess means Re-evaluate your position based on new information or alternative points of view to ensure continuous growth and learning.I think that by being open to ideas and comments while exercising critical thinking, individuals can navigate the complexities of learning effectively, both in the realm of cryptocurrencies and in a variety of real-life scenarios.[/list]

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: tech30338 on June 20, 2023, 01:47:32 AMSome people don't want to be teach by someone responding with hate when they were corrected by people who knows more about something, in return they learn nothing and stuck with little knowledge that they thought they know it all, Some people don't know how to correct others. They correct people in an unfriendly and disgraceful manner which might make the person react negatively. There is a need to correct people respectfully even if it is a child. Some people are not also happy when they correct them using disgraceful words like "Why are you asking such a stupid question, you are so dumb for not knowing this". I agree with your thoughts op but there is a need to learn how to correct people politely and respectfully.QuoteTips on how you will learn along they way, and be on track with crypto currency and also in real life scenario.Apply and test what they have told you All your recommendation are very good points but I want to add that you shouldn't apply before testing what you have been told. You should verify the information and if it is valid, you can test it before you apply those recommendations. Verifying is the process of researching more on the information and gathering more facts about it to ascertain if the information is valid or invalid. If it is invalid there is no need of going further to test or apply it.[/list]

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: tech30338 on June 20, 2023, 01:47:32 AMDon't get mad or upset when they correct you when you make mistakesIf any newbie is expecting leniency from senior members of the forum then sorry to disappoint you you won't get any. Getting upset by the statements or criticisms made about your post is of no use and there's no way you are going to stop more from coming. They say "iron shapeneth iron", for you to grow in post quality you need these criticisms cause without them the forum would be filled with lots of dull brains trolling around. It's only a person that don't want to learn gets angry when corrected. Correction mustn't come in the way you had wanted it that's why it's called correction.

comments.author: 20kevin20
comments.body: I think some people simply are like that and can’t be changed unless they want a change. I’ve met enough stubborn people who even if proven wrong continued to be stubborn and arrogant. That’s just the way they work I’d say.You can try your best and hardest but if they don’t want to think different, they won’t. So being open minded is a choice or part of their personality imo. Maybe part of it comes from education, but we all have a brain and if you’re told ten times that a thing won’t work and it doesn’t and you continue doing it, it’s not even worth trying anymore.

comments.author: Who is John Galt?
comments.body: Quote from: tech30338 on June 20, 2023, 03:32:58 AMAs a person like myself who knew little on a field or something there is no need for me to get mad, if they correct me and give me advice, and I am more willing to take shot as long as i learn from it, sad reality is some people don't want to hear comments, they take it personally and leave, they don't know that they are being corrected, take all the hit and learn will help a person in the future because they will also learn patience and controlling their emotions is also good to develop.If a more experienced person is willing to explain why I'm wrong, it's really worth tempering your pride and listening to his comments, analyzing them and thanking him for spending time on me.But if this person, irritably, from the height of his understanding of the problem, rudely says that I am wrong, even if I try to be modest and learn, this will often do little. Because often the gap in experience and knowledge may simply not allow me nor to understand what I am wrong about, nor what I can even start additional study with in order to ever understand my mistake. And in the end, only the annoyance of misunderstanding will remain.Not everything depends on the learner.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Surround yourself with people who criticize you. You will learn most from them. They will always push you with their negativity. Don't avoid people who always find a way to criticize you, they are kind of free bug testers working for you.
